cl.section: I become aware of your requirements to hire a software developer via your website and I enclose my resume in application for this role.

My experience as a developer includes two years of development at an Ireland based company where I have the responsibility of developing a Compliance Knowledge system. At a technical level I work with Hibarnate, Spring, Struts, Tomcat and Eclipse. My first exposure to java was in 1995 and since then I've been working on a number of java based projects involving Applets, JSPs and JDBC. Prior my current job I've been involved in a two year long project developing a web based data mining application using XML, XSLT, Xalan, Apache.
Should you be considering my application after reviewing the attached resume, I would welcome a personal meeting for further discussion on your needs and my ability to meet them.
Thank you for your time, consideration and forthcoming response.
